config.env_names_all: local remote base-all base-local base-remote alp-dev-sg-1 alp-dev-sg-2 alp-stg-de-1 alp-stg-sg-1 alp-stg-sg-2
config.env_names_dev: local remote base-all base-local base-remote alp-dev-sg-1

scripts.load:all: yarn load:permissions && yarn load:synpuf1k && yarn load:vocab
scripts.op:create:all: for ENV_NAME in ${npm_package_config_env_names_all[@]}; do yarn op:create $ENV_NAME; done
scripts.op:get:all: for ENV_NAME in ${npm_package_config_env_names_all[@]}; do OVERWRITE=$OVERWRITE ENV_NAME=$ENV_NAME yarn op:get; done
scripts.op:get:dev: for ENV_NAME in ${npm_package_config_env_names_dev[@]}; do OVERWRITE=$OVERWRITE ENV_NAME=$ENV_NAME yarn op:get; done
scripts.op:get:local: for ENV_NAME in base-all base-local local; do OVERWRITE=$OVERWRITE ENV_NAME=$ENV_NAME yarn op:get; done
scripts.op:get:remote: for ENV_NAME in base-all base-remote $ENV_NAME; do OVERWRITE=$OVERWRITE ENV_NAME=$ENV_NAME yarn op:get; done
scripts.op:put:all: for ENV_NAME in ${npm_package_config_env_names_all[@]}; do OVERWRITE=$OVERWRITE ENV_NAME=$ENV_NAME yarn op:put; done
scripts.op:put:dev: for ENV_NAME in ${npm_package_config_env_names_dev[@]}; do OVERWRITE=$OVERWRITE ENV_NAME=$ENV_NAME yarn op:put; done
